channel.title: kolkata on Intellectual Web
channel.description: Recent content in kolkata on Intellectual Web

item.title: An open letter to Bloggers from Kolkata.
item.description: On February 23, 2014 at 4:43pm, Anirban Saha made a post on Facebook Where are the Kolkata Bloggers? Like, seriously ? In August 8, 2009, Webreps organised Kolkata Bloggers Meet. That time I joined Webreps. In October 31, 2009, we organised the BCET Bloggers workshop in BCET. There BCREC and NITDgp also joined in. Have been active ever since then. In 2014 - I hardly find any blogger visible and audible.
